text: Leïla Sfez (Arabic: ليلى سفاز), (born 1874 –1944 Tunisia), was a Jewish Tunisian singer and composer She is also the aunt of the famous Habiba Msika to whom she will pass on her musical education. Sh became a celebrated café- concert performer in Tunis in the 1920s. She sang music in both the ma'luf and charqui genres. == References == Category:1874 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Singers from Tunis
title: Leïla Sfez
